Title: Illuminated Title Page
Medium: ink and pigments on thick, non-European paper and Italian paper
Description: This illuminated title page from Walters manuscript W.664 has the title and the author's name in the upper and lower panels and a round medallion (shamsah) in the middle, with no inscription.
Keywords: Islamic; Ottoman; Turkish; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Manuscript; Turkey Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Ahmedi (1334 (?)-815 AH/AD 1413)
